channel.title: Mini Game Help? - John
channel.description:
How would I make a Mini Game where each time you kill a npc you get points, when you die you lose nothing, and how would I make the points possible to spend after you get like 250 you can buy Armadyl Plate? If you know how to help me do so please teach me ;).
John_95_07@hotmail.com
I only want points to go up when you kill a certain npc. Exactly like Battle Scape.

[img]http://i237.photobucket.com/albums/ff78/0k0wn3d/minigamepic1.jpg[/img]
